q1.question: How does ReadIn AI protect my privacy?
q1.answer: All audio processing happens locally on your device using Whisper AI. Your conversations are never sent to external servers unless you explicitly enable cloud features.

q2.question: Which meeting platforms does it support?
q2.answer: ReadIn AI works with Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex, Discord, and any application that uses your system audio.

q3.question: Can others in the meeting see my AI suggestions?
q3.answer: No, ReadIn AI runs as a discreet overlay on your screen. Only you can see the suggestions, and there's no indication to others that you're using it.

q4.question: How accurate is the transcription?
q4.answer: We use OpenAI's Whisper model which achieves near-human accuracy. Performance may vary based on audio quality and background noise.

q5.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q5.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
